trans-unit.source: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.
trans-unit.target: 提供包含通道發送器的安全執行緒 (Thread-Safe) 集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> 會使用這個集合來管理與主機相關聯的通道發送器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherCollection> is created when <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.%23ctor%2A> is called and the collection can be accessed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherCollection>，而集合可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.%23ctor%2A> 屬性進行存取時，便會建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The collection contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> objects (and not just instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]programming model but replace the system-provided runtime.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase>物件 (不只是執行個體和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>) 因為也會使用的開發人員想要保留[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]程式設計模型，但是更換系統提供之執行階段。

trans-unit.source: They derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> and extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> (which inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>) by overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.InitializeRuntime%2A>, adding instances of the class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 他們會藉由覆寫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> 以及將衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 的類別執行個體加入至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>，從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.InitializeRuntime%2A> 衍生類別並擴充 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> (繼承自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別沒有公用建構函式 (Constructor)，而且無法在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 以外使用。

trans-unit.source: Removes all channel dispatchers from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除所有通道發送器。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be retrieved from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合擷取之通道發送器的索引 (以零起始)。

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher to be inserted into the collection as an element.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至集合成為其中項目的通道發送器。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a channel dispatcher into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將通道發送器插入至集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 與通道發送器集合相關聯的服務主機已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The commutation object is not in a state
trans-unit.target: 通訊物件未處於某個狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合移除之通道發送器的索引 (以零起始)。

trans-unit.source: Removes a channel dispatcher at a specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中指定的索引位置移除通道發送器。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 要取代之通道發送器的索引 (以零起始)。

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher to replace
trans-unit.target: 要取代的通道發送器

trans-unit.source: Replaces the channel dispatcher at a specified index with another item.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他項目取代指定索引位置的通道發送器。

trans-unit.source: The service associated with this collection of channel dispatchers is in a <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 與這個通道發送器集合相關聯的服務處於 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed" /> 狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。
